title: Add AnimationSpeed property to SKLottieView
body:
## Summary

Adds an `AnimationSpeed` property to `SKLottieView` to control Lottie animation playback speed, with comprehensive fixes for edge cases discovered through multi-model code review.

## Features

- **AnimationSpeed property** - Control playback speed (default 1.0)
  - Values > 1.0 speed up animation
  - Values 0-1.0 slow down animation  
  - Value 0 pauses animation
  - Negative values reverse playback direction

## Bug Fixes

| Fix | Description |
|-----|-------------|
| Negative speed on load | Animation now initializes at Duration when speed < 0 |
| Source race condition | Added CancellationTokenSource to cancel in-flight loads |
| Memory leak | CancellationTokenSource now properly disposed |
| Reset order | Added `isResetting` guard to prevent spurious AnimationCompleted |
| Reverse + negative speed | Fixed flip logic to consider effective direction |
| **Reverse → Restart switch** | Fixed animation getting stuck at 0 when switching modes |

## Code Quality

- Renamed `playForwards` → `isInForwardPhase` for clarity
- Added XML documentation to AnimationSpeed property
- Added overflow protection for NaN/Infinity/extreme speed values

## Demo App Enhancements

- AnimationSpeed slider (-2x to 2x)
- Speed preset buttons (-1x, 0.5x, 1x, 2x)
- RepeatMode picker (Restart/Reverse)
- RepeatCount input field

## Tests

Added 18+ new tests covering:
- Positive/negative/zero speed scenarios
- Speed changes mid-playback
- RepeatMode interactions
- Edge cases (NaN, Infinity, extreme values)
- Mode switching scenarios

**Total: 140 MAUI tests passing**

## API Naming Research

| Library | Property Name |
|---------|---------------|
| lottie-android | `speed` |
| lottie-ios | `animationSpeed` |
| lottie-web | `setSpeed()` |
| **This PR** | `AnimationSpeed` |

Follows iOS convention for .NET clarity.
